name: MSCRMExtractSolution
description: Unpacks a PowerApps/CDS/Dynamics 365 Solution zip into mutiple files using SolutionPackager.exe
author: Wael Hamze
helpMarkDown: You can control the version using of the SolutionPackager used using the Tools Installer Task

inputs.name: unpackedFilesFolder
inputs.label: Unpacked Files Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder path to store the xml solution files extracted using SolutionPackager.exe

inputs.name: mappingFile
inputs.label: Mapping File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The mapping file in source control to be used by the SolutionPackager.exe when extracting the solution

inputs.name: packageType
inputs.label: Package Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of solution package to create

inputs.name: solutionFile
inputs.label: Solution File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path on the agent machine to the solution zip file. For package type = Both, use the unmanaged zip

inputs.name: sourceLoc
inputs.label: Source Loc
inputs.helpMarkDown: This argument generates a template resource file

inputs.name: localize
inputs.label: Localize
inputs.helpMarkDown: Extract or merge all string resources into .resx files

inputs.name: treatUnpackWarningsAsErrors
inputs.label: Treat Warnings as Errors
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true to fail the task if any warnings are encountered during the extract operation
